/** * Describes a constraining facet. Enumeration and pattern facets are exposed * via XSMultiValueFacet interface. */
unit.class: public interface XSFacet extends XSObject { /** * The name of the facet, e.g. FACET_LENGTH, FACET_TOTALDIGITS * (see XSSimpleTypeDefinition). */ public short getFacetKind (); /** * A value of this facet. */ public String getLexicalFacetValue (); /** * [Facets]: check whether a facet is fixed. */ public boolean getFixed (); /** * An annotation if it exists, otherwise null. */ public XSAnnotation getAnnotation (); }
